name: I Still Want to Be Here
name_original: I Still Want to Be Here
description:
"I Still Want to Be Here" is a short, personal journaling game that puts you in the shoes of someone who has made a Faustian bargain to trade their memories in order to save a dying lover.

This book includes

  • 10 writing and drawing prompts that ask you to craft the sensations and memories of your relationship
  • A brief frame narrative with an epilogue

You will need

  • A notebook with at least fifteen pages
  • A writing utensil
  • Coloring utensils
  • A dark utensil to be used to cross things out
